@llib wrote:

Advice to the thread starter:

“Theres two things you NEVER talk about with friends…politics & religion.”

This is thread is proof why…next time seriously google it.

To some of you people asking questons such as “Why does God let people commit crime etc, etc.”
Answer: God choose to give man FREE WILL :eek: Interveining would be taking away free will.

Not saying I personally believe in God, just saying that I have asked questons before and thats the answer I got.

item.title: Please help me, i really need help.. please omg please i beg you plz?
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

When you die, you just die. There is no afterlife or anything. Although, I do believe in reincarnation. My soul will go on and fuel another body, but my mind will not.

As for the topic-starter, don’t worry about it. God is unimportant, and fictional. And if he were a person, some words to describe him would be: manipulative and deceitful.

item.title: Please help me, i really need help.. please omg please i beg you plz?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

MastrChief:

God is a figure that some of us believe exists so we can feel better about dying. You believe in heaven, why? You hope that death is not the end and that you will be praised for your good deeds in life.

I sort of believe in you, however, not completely. The ancient Egyptian way was, if your body and soul was intact, you would go to the afterlife with all your worldly goods in your tomb helping you get there, I personally believe in reincarnation, but can’t dismiss the thought of no afterlife. I don’t believe in heaven or hell as an afterlife, either.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“mcmoney-isc00l, post:40, topic:110627”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=158077.msg1547962#msg1547962 date=1182922813]

umm lemme tell u a little about God, God is the creator of the Universe, ever thing you see, everything you don’t see, everything you think, everything you will think. God knew you before you were born. God made you in his own image. God created " everything "

God is a fictional character, and since there is no evidence to show otherwise, prove me wrong.
[/quote]
yeah he is right…God is real…duh…what da ya think happened we just kinda appeared here???..if you believe that…you might wanna see a theripist…
My my, the religious type, I see.[/quote]

Sorry, just had to fix your quote, but anyway, lets continue.

The most common argument, if god created us, who created him? So, lets go on to your argument, if he didn’t create us, we just appeared here, however since you insist god created us, did god just appear?

item.title: Please help me, i really need help.. please omg please i beg you plz?
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

lmao! You kids are funny.

So far Dell451 has the most believable theory.
Abridged version of my theory: There is no “god”. The universe always was and always will be. Everything repeats. The universe repeats itself in a length of time incomprehensible to human minds.

I have a religion, but it doesn’t involve “god”.

Or we all could be some aliens experiments. Absence of evidence is not evidence of absence! (That basically means you can believe whatever the hell you want unless proven wrong. And I mean PROVEN. With like facts and data, not just because tons of people say so).

As for the thread creator: Why do you need to know? and how the hell have you never heard of “god”?

Read full topic
